Key Match Events: Brazil missed a string of chances and were held 0-0 by Costa Rica in their Copa America Group D opener.
Joseph Mora (Costa Rica) won a free kick in the defensive half in the 90'+5' minute.
Post-Match Reflections: Costa Rica held Brazil scoreless in the Copa opener.
Brazil rued a lack of quality in the final third after the match ended 0-0.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match took place at SoFi Stadium in Inglewood, California, USA.
